00081 typedef char Char;
00082 typedef unsigned char Bool;
00083 typedef unsigned char UChar;
00084 typedef int Int32;
00085 typedef unsigned int UInt32;

00093 #ifndef BZ_NO_STDIO
00094 extern void BZ2_bz__AssertH__fail ( int errcode );
00095 #define AssertH(cond,errcode) \
00096    { if (!(cond)) BZ2_bz__AssertH__fail ( errcode ); }
00097 #if BZ_DEBUG
00098 #define AssertD(cond,msg) \
00099    { if (!(cond)) {       \
00100       fprintf ( stderr,   \
00101         "\n\nlibbzip2(debug build): internal error\n\t%s\n", msg );\
00102       exit(1); \
00103    }}
00104 #else
00105 #define AssertD(cond,msg)       /* */
00106 #endif
00107 #define VPrintf0(zf) \
00108    fprintf(stderr,zf)
00109 #define VPrintf1(zf,za1) \
00110    fprintf(stderr,zf,za1)
00111 #define VPrintf2(zf,za1,za2) \
00112    fprintf(stderr,zf,za1,za2)
00113 #define VPrintf3(zf,za1,za2,za3) \
00114    fprintf(stderr,zf,za1,za2,za3)
00115 #define VPrintf4(zf,za1,za2,za3,za4) \
00116    fprintf(stderr,zf,za1,za2,za3,za4)
00117 #define VPrintf5(zf,za1,za2,za3,za4,za5) \
00118    fprintf(stderr,zf,za1,za2,za3,za4,za5)
00119 #else
00120 extern void bz_internal_error ( int errcode );
00121 #define AssertH(cond,errcode) \
00122    { if (!(cond)) bz_internal_error ( errcode ); }
00123 #define AssertD(cond,msg)       /* */
00124 #define VPrintf0(zf)            /* */
00125 #define VPrintf1(zf,za1)        /* */
00126 #define VPrintf2(zf,za1,za2)    /* */
00127 #define VPrintf3(zf,za1,za2,za3)    /* */
00128 #define VPrintf4(zf,za1,za2,za3,za4)    /* */
00129 #define VPrintf5(zf,za1,za2,za3,za4,za5)    /* */
00130 #endif

00146 #define BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE 258
00147 #define BZ_MAX_CODE_LEN    23
00148 
00149 #define BZ_RUNA 0
00150 #define BZ_RUNB 1
00151 
00152 #define BZ_N_GROUPS 6
00153 #define BZ_G_SIZE   50
00154 #define BZ_N_ITERS  4
00155 
00156 #define BZ_MAX_SELECTORS (2 + (900000 / BZ_G_SIZE))

00160 /*-- Stuff for randomising repetitive blocks. --*/
00161 
00162 extern Int32 BZ2_rNums[512];
00163 
00164 #define BZ_RAND_DECLS                          \
00165    Int32 rNToGo;                               \
00166    Int32 rTPos                                 \
00167 
00168 #define BZ_RAND_INIT_MASK                      \
00169    s->rNToGo = 0;                              \
00170    s->rTPos  = 0                               \
00171 
00172 #define BZ_RAND_MASK ((s->rNToGo == 1) ? 1 : 0)
00173 
00174 #define BZ_RAND_UPD_MASK                       \
00175    if (s->rNToGo == 0) {                       \
00176       s->rNToGo = BZ2_rNums[s->rTPos];         \
00177       s->rTPos++;                              \
00178       if (s->rTPos == 512) s->rTPos = 0;       \
00179    }                                           \
00180    s->rNToGo--;
00181 
00182 
00183 
00184 /*-- Stuff for doing CRCs. --*/
00185 
00186 extern UInt32 BZ2_crc32Table[256];
00187 
00188 #define BZ_INITIALISE_CRC(crcVar)              \
00189 {                                              \
00190    crcVar = 0xffffffffL;                       \
00191 }
00192 
00193 #define BZ_FINALISE_CRC(crcVar)                \
00194 {                                              \
00195    crcVar = ~(crcVar);                         \
00196 }
00197 
00198 #define BZ_UPDATE_CRC(crcVar,cha)              \
00199 {                                              \
00200    crcVar = (crcVar << 8) ^                    \
00201             BZ2_crc32Table[(crcVar >> 24) ^    \
00202                            ((UChar)cha)];      \
00203 }
00204

00207 /*-- States and modes for compression. --*/
00208 
00209 #define BZ_M_IDLE      1
00210 #define BZ_M_RUNNING   2
00211 #define BZ_M_FLUSHING  3
00212 #define BZ_M_FINISHING 4
00213 
00214 #define BZ_S_OUTPUT    1
00215 #define BZ_S_INPUT     2
00216 
00217 #define BZ_N_RADIX 2
00218 #define BZ_N_QSORT 12
00219 #define BZ_N_SHELL 18
00220 #define BZ_N_OVERSHOOT (BZ_N_RADIX + BZ_N_QSORT + BZ_N_SHELL + 2)

00225 /*-- Structure holding all the compression-side stuff. --*/
00226 
00227 typedef struct
00228 {
00229     /*
00230      * pointer back to the struct bz_stream 
00231      */
00232     bz_stream *strm;
00233 
00234     /*
00235      * mode this stream is in, and whether inputting 
00236      */
00237     /*
00238      * or outputting data 
00239      */
00240     Int32 mode;
00241     Int32 state;
00242 
00243     /*
00244      * remembers avail_in when flush/finish requested 
00245      */
00246     UInt32 avail_in_expect;
00247 
00248     /*
00249      * for doing the block sorting 
00250      */
00251     UInt32 *arr1;
00252     UInt32 *arr2;
00253     UInt32 *ftab;
00254     Int32 origPtr;
00255 
00256     /*
00257      * aliases for arr1 and arr2 
00258      */
00259     UInt32 *ptr;
00260     UChar *block;
00261     UInt16 *mtfv;
00262     UChar *zbits;
00263 
00264     /*
00265      * for deciding when to use the fallback sorting algorithm 
00266      */
00267     Int32 workFactor;
00268 
00269     /*
00270      * run-length-encoding of the input 
00271      */
00272     UInt32 state_in_ch;
00273     Int32 state_in_len;
00274       BZ_RAND_DECLS;
00275 
00276     /*
00277      * input and output limits and current posns 
00278      */
00279     Int32 nblock;
00280     Int32 nblockMAX;
00281     Int32 numZ;
00282     Int32 state_out_pos;
00283 
00284     /*
00285      * map of bytes used in block 
00286      */
00287     Int32 nInUse;
00288     Bool inUse[256];
00289     UChar unseqToSeq[256];
00290 
00291     /*
00292      * the buffer for bit stream creation 
00293      */
00294     UInt32 bsBuff;
00295     Int32 bsLive;
00296 
00297     /*
00298      * block and combined CRCs 
00299      */
00300     UInt32 blockCRC;
00301     UInt32 combinedCRC;
00302 
00303     /*
00304      * misc administratium 
00305      */
00306     Int32 verbosity;
00307     Int32 blockNo;
00308     Int32 blockSize100k;
00309 
00310     /*
00311      * stuff for coding the MTF values 
00312      */
00313     Int32 nMTF;
00314     Int32 mtfFreq[BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE];
00315     UChar selector[BZ_MAX_SELECTORS];
00316     UChar selectorMtf[BZ_MAX_SELECTORS];
00317 
00318     UChar len[BZ_N_GROUPS][BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE];
00319     Int32 code[BZ_N_GROUPS][BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE];
00320     Int32 rfreq[BZ_N_GROUPS][BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE];
00321     /*
00322      * second dimension: only 3 needed; 4 makes index calculations faster 
00323      */
00324     UInt32 len_pack[BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE][4];
00325 
00326 }

00351 #define BZ_X_MAGIC_2     11

00357 #define BZ_X_BLKHDR_4    17

00360 #define BZ_X_BCRC_1      20
00361 #define BZ_X_BCRC_2      21
00362 #define BZ_X_BCRC_3      22
00363 #define BZ_X_BCRC_4      23
00364 #define BZ_X_RANDBIT     24
00365 #define BZ_X_ORIGPTR_1   25
00366 #define BZ_X_ORIGPTR_2   26
00367 #define BZ_X_ORIGPTR_3   27
00368 #define BZ_X_MAPPING_1   28
00369 #define BZ_X_MAPPING_2   29
00370 #define BZ_X_SELECTOR_1  30
00371 #define BZ_X_SELECTOR_2  31
00372 #define BZ_X_SELECTOR_3  32
00373 #define BZ_X_CODING_1    33
00374 #define BZ_X_CODING_2    34
00375 #define BZ_X_CODING_3    35

00377 #define BZ_X_MTF_2       37
00378 #define BZ_X_MTF_3       38

00382 #define BZ_X_ENDHDR_2    42
00383 #define BZ_X_ENDHDR_3    43
00384 #define BZ_X_ENDHDR_4    44
00385 #define BZ_X_ENDHDR_5    45
00386 #define BZ_X_ENDHDR_6    46

00397 #define MTFL_SIZE 16

00401 /*-- Structure holding all the decompression-side stuff. --*/
00402 
00403 typedef struct
00404 {
00405     /*
00406      * pointer back to the struct bz_stream 
00407      */
00408     bz_stream *strm;
00409 
00410     /*
00411      * state indicator for this stream 
00412      */
00413     Int32 state;
00414 
00415     /*
00416      * for doing the final run-length decoding 
00417      */
00418     UChar state_out_ch;
00419     Int32 state_out_len;
00420     Bool blockRandomised;
00421       BZ_RAND_DECLS;
00422 
00423     /*
00424      * the buffer for bit stream reading 
00425      */
00426     UInt32 bsBuff;
00427     Int32 bsLive;
00428 
00429     /*
00430      * misc administratium 
00431      */
00432     Int32 blockSize100k;
00433     Bool smallDecompress;
00434     Int32 currBlockNo;
00435     Int32 verbosity;
00436 
00437     /*
00438      * for undoing the Burrows-Wheeler transform 
00439      */
00440     Int32 origPtr;
00441     UInt32 tPos;
00442     Int32 k0;
00443     Int32 unzftab[256];
00444     Int32 nblock_used;
00445     Int32 cftab[257];
00446     Int32 cftabCopy[257];
00447 
00448     /*
00449      * for undoing the Burrows-Wheeler transform (FAST) 
00450      */
00451     UInt32 *tt;
00452 
00453     /*
00454      * for undoing the Burrows-Wheeler transform (SMALL) 
00455      */
00456     UInt16 *ll16;
00457     UChar *ll4;
00458 
00459     /*
00460      * stored and calculated CRCs 
00461      */
00462     UInt32 storedBlockCRC;
00463     UInt32 storedCombinedCRC;
00464     UInt32 calculatedBlockCRC;
00465     UInt32 calculatedCombinedCRC;
00466 
00467     /*
00468      * map of bytes used in block 
00469      */
00470     Int32 nInUse;
00471     Bool inUse[256];
00472     Bool inUse16[16];
00473     UChar seqToUnseq[256];
00474 
00475     /*
00476      * for decoding the MTF values 
00477      */
00478     UChar mtfa[MTFA_SIZE];
00479     Int32 mtfbase[256 / MTFL_SIZE];
00480     UChar selector[BZ_MAX_SELECTORS];
00481     UChar selectorMtf[BZ_MAX_SELECTORS];
00482     UChar len[BZ_N_GROUPS][BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE];
00483 
00484     Int32 limit[BZ_N_GROUPS][BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE];
00485     Int32 base[BZ_N_GROUPS][BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE];
00486     Int32 perm[BZ_N_GROUPS][BZ_MAX_ALPHA_SIZE];
00487     Int32 minLens[BZ_N_GROUPS];
00488 
00489     /*
00490      * save area for scalars in the main decompress code 
00491      */
00492     Int32 save_i;
00493     Int32 save_j;
00494     Int32 save_t;
00495     Int32 save_alphaSize;
00496     Int32 save_nGroups;
00497     Int32 save_nSelectors;
00498     Int32 save_EOB;
00499     Int32 save_groupNo;
00500     Int32 save_groupPos;
00501     Int32 save_nextSym;
00502     Int32 save_nblockMAX;
00503     Int32 save_nblock;
00504     Int32 save_es;
00505     Int32 save_N;
00506     Int32 save_curr;
00507     Int32 save_zt;
00508     Int32 save_zn;
00509     Int32 save_zvec;
00510     Int32 save_zj;
00511     Int32 save_gSel;
00512     Int32 save_gMinlen;
00513     Int32 *save_gLimit;
00514     Int32 *save_gBase;
00515     Int32 *save_gPerm;
00516 
00517 }
00518 DState;

00521 
00522 /*-- Macros for decompression. --*/
00523 
00524 #define BZ_GET_FAST(cccc)                     \
00525     s->tPos = s->tt[s->tPos];                 \
00526     cccc = (UChar)(s->tPos & 0xff);           \
00527     s->tPos >>= 8;
00528 
00529 #define BZ_GET_FAST_C(cccc)                   \
00530     c_tPos = c_tt[c_tPos];                    \
00531     cccc = (UChar)(c_tPos & 0xff);            \
00532     c_tPos >>= 8;
00533 
00534 #define SET_LL4(i,n)                                          \
00535    { if (((i) & 0x1) == 0)                                    \
00536         s->ll4[(i) >> 1] = (s->ll4[(i) >> 1] & 0xf0) | (n); else    \
00537         s->ll4[(i) >> 1] = (s->ll4[(i) >> 1] & 0x0f) | ((n) << 4);  \
00538    }
00539 
00540 #define GET_LL4(i)                             \
00541    ((((UInt32)(s->ll4[(i) >> 1])) >> (((i) << 2) & 0x4)) & 0xF)
00542 
00543 #define SET_LL(i,n)                          \
00544    { s->ll16[i] = (UInt16)(n & 0x0000ffff);  \
00545      SET_LL4(i, n >> 16);                    \
00546    }
00547 
00548 #define GET_LL(i) \
00549    (((UInt32)s->ll16[i]) | (GET_LL4(i) << 16))
00550 
00551 #define BZ_GET_SMALL(cccc)                            \
00552       cccc = BZ2_indexIntoF ( s->tPos, s->cftab );    \
00553       s->tPos = GET_LL(s->tPos);
00554 
00555

00559

00561 
00562 extern void BZ2_hbCreateDecodeTables ( Int32 *, Int32 *, Int32 *, UChar *, Int32, Int32, Int32 );

00564 
00565 #endif
